global.creator_institution: Norwegian Meteorological Institute (MET Norway)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > ATMOSPHERIC/OCEAN INDICATORS > TEMPERATURE INDICES, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC TEMPERATURE > SURFACE TEMPERATURE > AIR TEMPERATURE, GEMET:Atmospheric conditions, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in mean air temperature (ca. 2 meters above ground) between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period for year or season, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig lufttemperatur (ca 2 meter over bakken) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode for år eller sesong. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning.
global.title: Annual or seasonal difference in mean air temperature averaged over the periods 2041–2070 or 2071–2100 under emission scenario {scenario}, compared to 1991–2020.
global.title_no: differanse i middeltemperatur for år eller sesonger, midlet over periodene 2041–2070 eller 2071–2100 under utslippsscenario {scenario}, sammenlignet med 1991–2020

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Meteorological Institute (MET Norway)
global.creator_name: Ole Einar Tveito, Helga Therese Tilley Tajet
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > ATMOSPHERIC/OCEAN INDICATORS > TEMPERATURE INDICES, GEMET:Atmospheric conditions, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the number of days with an average air temperature below zero degrees (tas <0 °C) between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. Based on daily temperature normals.
global.summary_no: Endring i antall dager med gjennomsnittlig lufttemperatur under null grader (tas<0 °C) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Basert på døgnnormaler for temperatur, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning.

Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Basert på døgnnormaler for temperatur.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Meteorological Institute (MET Norway)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > ATMOSPHERIC/OCEAN INDICATORS > TEMPERATURE INDICES > GROWING DEGREE DAYS, GEMET:Atmospheric conditions, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the sum of degree days above 5 degrees (tas>5ºC) between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. Growing degree days, also called growing degree numbers, are the sum of the heat of the day and are a measure of how good the conditions are for plant growth. The heat sum for a day is defined as the number of degrees the daily average temperature is above a threshold value (which here is tas > 5 ºC). The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. Based on daily temperature normals.
global.summary_no: Endring i sum av graddager over 5 grader (tas>5°C) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Vekstgraddager, også kalt vekstgradtall, er døgnet sin varmesum og er et mål på hvor gode forhold det er for planters vekst. Varmesummen til en dag er definert som antall grader døgnmiddeltemperaturen ligger over en terskelverdi (som her er tas > 5 ºC). Basert på døgnnormaler for temperatur.
global.title: Annual or seasonal difference in growing degree-days averaged over the periods 2041–2070 or 2071–2100 under emission scenario {scenario}, compared to 1991–2020.
global.title_no: differanse i vekstgraddager for år eller sesonger, midlet over periodene 2041–2070 eller 2071–2100 under utslippsscenario {scenario}, sammenlignet med 1991–2020

global.summary: Change in the number of days with precipitation exceeding the 95 percentile for the reference period and for the whole year (pr>95p) for year or season, between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
global.summary_no: Endring i antall dager med nedbør over 95 persentilen for referanseperioden og hele året (pr>95p) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode for år eller sesong, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100.
global.title: Annual or seasonal difference in very wet days averaged over the periods 2041–2070 or 2071–2100 under emission scenario {scenario}, compared to 1991–2020.

global.summary_no: Prosentvis endring i gjennomsnittlig avrenningsum mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode for år eller sesong, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. global.title_no: Differanse i avrenning for år eller årstider, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

global.summary: Change in mean runoff amount between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period for year or season, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. (kg m-2 equals mm)
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig avrenningsum mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode for år eller sesong, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. (kg m-2 tilsvarer mm)
global.title_no: Endring i avrenning for år eller årstider, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

global.summary: Percentage change in mean evapotranspiration amount between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period for year or season, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
global.summary_no: Prosentvis endring i gjennomsnittlig fordampningsum mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode for år eller sesong, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100.
global.title_no: Endring i fordampning for år eller årstider, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

data variables.long_name: difference in annual maximum snow water equivalent

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > CRYOSPHERIC INDICATORS, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CRYOSPHERE > SNOW/ICE > SNOW WATER EQUIVALENT, GEMET:Change Over Time In Surface Snow Amount, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the mean annual maximum snow water equivalent between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. (kg m-2 equals mm)
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig årlig maksimal snømengde (mm vann snøen representerer den dagen i året det er maksimalt med snø) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. (kg m-2 tilsvarer mm)
global.title_no: Differanse i største årlige snømengde for år, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > CRYOSPHERIC INDICATORS > SNOW COVER, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CRYOSPHERE > SNOW/ICE > SNOW COVER, GEMET:geological / hydrological, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the mean annual number of skiing days between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. Skiing days are defined as days with snow water equivalent more than 60 mm (equals snow depth more than 25 cm when the snow density is assumed 0.25 kg/L).
global.summary_no: Endring i skisesong mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Skisesong defineres som gjennomsnittlig antall døgn per år med snøvannekvivalent over 60 mm (tilsvarer snødybde cirka 25 cm, når tettheten settes til 0,25 kg/L).
global.title_no: Differanse i skisesongens lengde for år, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > CRYOSPHERIC INDICATORS > SNOW COVER, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CRYOSPHERE > SNOW/ICE > SNOW COVER, GEMET:geological / hydrological, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the mean annual number of ski mountaineering days between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. Ski mountaineering days are defined as days with snow water equivalent more than 120 mm (equals snow depth more than 50 cm when the snow density is assumed 0.25 kg/L).
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig antall toppturskidager i året mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Toppturskidager defineres som gjennomsnittlig antall dager per år med snømengde over 120 mm (tilsvarer snødybde cirka 50 cm, når tettheten settes til 0,25 kg/L).
global.title_no: Differanse i topptursesongens lengde for år, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

data variables.long_name: difference in summer soil moisture content

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > LAND SURFACE/AGRICULTURE INDICATORS > SOIL MOISTURE, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL MOISTURE/WATER CONTENT, GEMET:Soil Moisture Content, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the mean soil moisture content in summer (May, June, July, August and September) between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. (kg m-2 equals mm)
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig markvannsinnhold om sommeren (mai, juni, juli, august og september) mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. (kg m-2 tilsvarer mm)
global.title_no: Differanse i markvannsinnhold for sommersesongen, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

data variables.norwegian_name: differanse i varighet av hydrologisk tørke

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > LAND SURFACE/AGRICULTURE INDICATORS > DROUGHT DURATION, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > HUMAN DIMENSIONS > NATURAL HAZARDS > DROUGHTS > DROUGHT DURATION, GEMET:drought, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Change in the mean drought duration in summer (15. June to 15. October) between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100. Drought duration is defined as number of consecutive days with runoff below the 30th percentile from the flow duration curve for the reference period. The computation is based on smoothed daily runoff using the 11-day moving average procedure.
global.summary_no: Endring i gjennomsnittlig tørkevarighet 15. juni til 15. oktober mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100. Tørkevarighet er definert som antall sammenhengende dager med avrenning under 30-persentilen for referanseperioden. Beregningen er basert på 11-dagers glidende midling av daglig avrenning.
global.title_no: Differanse i varighet av hydrologisk tørke for 15. juni til 15. oktober, under utslippsscenario {scenario}.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Meteorological Institute (MET Norway), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.creator_name: Ole Einar Tveito, Irene Brox Nilsen
global.keywords: GCMDSK:Earth Science > CLIMATE INDICATORS > LAND SURFACE/AGRICULTURE INDICATORS > DROUGHT SEVERITY, GEMET:Hydrography, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Index for severe meteorological drought (SPEI3 < -1.5 standard deviations) at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. This index gives the difference in the frequency of severe meteorological drought during May, June, July, August and September between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
global.summary_no: Indeks for meteorologisk tørke (SPEI3 < -1.5 standardavvik), for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Indeksen gir differanse i forekomst av alvorlig meteorologisk tørke i sommermånedene mai, juni, juli, august og september.
global.title: Seasonal severe meteorological drought under forcing scenario SSP3-7.0.
